properties.name: jwt.access.secret
properties.description: The secret key used to sign the JWT access token.

properties.name: jwt.access.expiration
properties.description: The expiration time of the JWT access token **in seconds**.

properties.name: jwt.refresh.secret
properties.description: The secret key used to sign the JWT refresh token.

properties.name: jwt.refresh.expiration
properties.description: The expiration time of the JWT refresh token **in seconds**.
